description:
Want to help build a sustainable future, protect the environment, and make a real difference, every day? At Convertus Group, we offer career opportunities at the cutting-edge of organic waste treatment, to talented and enthusiastic people like you!
What We Do
We partner with communities in North America to design, build, operate and service state-of-the-art organic waste treatment facilities. Our eco-friendly facilities divert residential and commercial organic (green) waste from landfills and convert it into valuable resources such as biogas and compost.
Why We Do It
We inspire and empower communities to close the loop for a sustainable future for all our children. Why not join us?
What do you need to love about your work?
Are you an individual who feels motivated by the Convertus values of Care, One Team, and Creativity?
Does discovering new solutions for current problems energize you?
Do you love leading a team of driven individuals?
Does a constantly changing list of priorities and action items excite you?
If you answer yes to these questions, read on for the qualifications!
What are we looking for on your CV?

 Knowledge of composting processes and process installation(s) preferably experienced in biological processing of organic waste streams
 Post-secondary degree or diploma in sciences or related field (biology, chemistry, environmental engineering, etc.).
 Clear understanding of the value of compost and its by-products.
 Two years’ experience with SCADA and different types of measuring and control technology.
 Intermediate computer skills (MS Office, SCADA, ERP).

Why us?
We strive to offer an environment that provides our associates with the right balance between work and family. We offer a comprehensive benefits package including:

 Profit-Sharing
 Medical and Dental
 Professional Development and Training
 Tuition Reimbursement Program
 Workplace Wellness Programs
 Paid Time Off – Sick, Vacation
 Employee Assistance Programs
 Employee Recognition Programs
 Dress for your day policy

Feel that this position is calling your name? Apply now!
Convertus Group is a Living Wage and Progressive Indigenous Relations committed employer. We believe in providing equal opportunity and creating an inclusive environment for all candidates and employees. We welcome applications regardless of ethnic origin, national origin, gender, gender identity, race, colour, religious beliefs, disability, sexual orientation, age, or marital status.
We thank you for your application; however, only successful applicants will be contacted.
Job Type: Full-time
Schedule:

 Monday to Friday

Ability to commute/relocate:

 Gloucester, ON K1G 3Y3: reliably commute or plan to relocate before starting work (preferred)

Experience:

 Leadership: 1 year (preferred)

Licence/Certification:

 Drivers Licence (preferred)

Work Location: In person
